name: Punch A Random Guy 2
description:
NOTE: The game can take up to a minute to load depending on your wifi and computer; as the game is 50MB in total.

Punch A Random Guy 2 is the sequel to Punch A Random Guy.

The game is a "Point and Click Adventure" game where the player can click on things and choose different options; which lead to different scenarios.

"How much endings are in this game?"

Oh boy-

2 Normal Endings.

2 Secret Ending.

5 Joke Endings.

2 Boss fights.In this game, you punch a random guy.

 This game was made by: Me, Choc1milk_games (Main Musician), YourStarKid (Guest Musician - he left GameJolt :(   ). #horror #action #arcade #retro #analog #strategy #pointnclick #puzzle
